cooridinate.description: x, y cooridinate to start text

nio/PILDrawText.Description: Draw text to an existing PIL Image

Output.Description: Same list of signals as input.

nio/PILNewImage.Description: Create a new PIL Image and store it in the *image* attribute of the input signal.

Output.Description: Same list of signals as input, with the added *image* attribute.

nio/PILOpenFile.Description: Load and image file from disk and create a new PIL Image and store it in the *image* attribute of the input signal.

Output.Description: Same list of signals as input, with the added *image* attribute.
